title: France Steps Closer to Implementing MiCA for Crypto Firms
description: The country's financial regulator AMF has "enhanced" registration requirements for digital asset service providers set to take effect on Jan. 1, 2024.

title: Bolero 'Song Shares' Paints Bright Future for Future of NFT-fueled Music
description: Bolero Music's blockchain-based model lets fans to invest in music, and gives them a fraction of a song’s master recording.

title: Hong Kong Securities Regulator Warns Unlicensed Crypto Exchanges
description: The Securities and Futures Commission (SFC) of Hong Kong has issued a warning to unlicensed providers of crypto trading services. Concerned about their engagement in “improper practices,” the regulator also said investors should be aware that some of these platforms may never actually apply for or obtain a license. Hong Kong’s SFC Threatens Crypto Exchanges […]

title: Aptos Labs and Microsoft’s OpenAI Join Forces to Propel Web3 Expansion
description: In a move poised to reshape the landscape of Web3, Aptos Labs has forged a strategic partnership with Microsoft’s OpenAI. title: Crypto whales opting for utility in Everlodge, Aptos, and Near Protocol
description: Crypto whales are opting for utilitarian projects like Everlodge (ELDG), Aptos (APT), and Near Protocol (NEAR)

title: Fireblocks disclosed vulnerabilities for crypto wallets
description: Research group Fireblocks has disclosed several vulnerabilities that could affect wallets using multi-party computation (MPC) technology providers.
